edu.umd.cs.dmonner.tweater.util
Class AlertEmailer

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.cs.dmonner.tweater.util.AlertEmailer

public class AlertEmailer
extends java.lang.Object

A class that reads email information from a Properties object and can thereafter send email message alerts.

Author:
dmonner

Constructor Summary
AlertEmailer(java.util.Properties props)
          Reads SMTP server, to-email, and from-email from the given Properties file.
 
Method Summary
 void send(java.lang.String subj, java.lang.String msg)
          Sends an alert message, with the specified subject and message contents, using the SMTP server, to address, and from address that were read when this object was created.
static void send(java.lang.String smtp, java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String subj, java.lang.String body)
          Sends an email using the given parameters.
